main event: Five to seven pilots sighted an unidentified object over Louisville, Kentucky, at 2:05 p.m. on July 22, 1952.
interesting points: The object maintained a constant heading for about 5 minutes before disappearing., The object resembled a star but was red-tinged in color., The sighting occurred at an altitude of approximately 50,000 feet., The object was seen traveling well over 100 miles per hour without a visible trail or exhaust., Both witness pilots were described as reliable and experienced.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a star
